headline: Wall Street Lunch: Gold, Silver Hit All-Time Highs As Safe-Haven Demand Surges
summary: Gold (XAUUSD:CUR) and silver (XAGUSD:CUR) hit fresh all-time highs, with gold up about 1% above $4,641/oz and silver jumping 6% to top $90/oz for the first time.

headline: 1 Nasdaq 100 Stock to Consider Right Now and 2 Facing Headwinds
summary: While the Nasdaq 100 (^NDX) is filled with cutting-edge technology and consumer companies, not all are on solid footing. Some are dealing with declining demand, high costs, or regulatory pressures that could limit future upside.
